definitions.text: any division of quantity accepted as a standard of measurement or exchange
examples: the dollar is the United States unit of currency
a unit of wheat is a bushel

definitions.text: an individual or group or structure or other entity regarded as a structural or functional constituent of a whole
examples: the reduced the number of units and installations
the word is a basic linguistic unit

definitions.text: an organization regarded as part of a larger social group
examples: the coach said the offensive unit did a good job
after the battle the soldier had trouble rejoining his unit
an idea is not a unit that can be moved from one brain to another

definitions.text: a single undivided natural thing occurring in the composition of something else
an assemblage of parts that is regarded as a single entity
examples: how big is that part compared to the whole?
